com.riskgame.service.Impl

Class MapManagementImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskgame.service.Impl.MapManagementImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapManagementInterface

    @Service
public class MapManagementImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements MapManagementInterface
    This is the implementation class of MapManagementInterface having business logic of map management including create map, update map,edit map, validate map etc.
    Author:
    Zankhanaben Patel, Piyush Thummar
    See Also:
    RiskMap, Continent, Territory, MapManagementInterface
